channel.title: Need Help Getting Server Online/coder! :/
channel.description:
Okay, so I need some serious help lol. I downloaded a source and client and Im pretty sure PortForward'd correctly, but Im a noob at this, and Im a girl so I got some serious issues lol! Anyone who can help me get the server online is PROMISED a staff position!!! Im also looking for someone who can help me with the coding. I have some knowlage of how to code, but Im by no means a pro :) Staff position is also PROMISED for the coder! I want to make a server that people will be wanting to come back to everyday :P Any and all help is appreciated! (p.s I also have Teamviewer if that helps any)
-Zay
